description: Two inmates engaged in a violent altercation in the prison yard.
A prison guard was injured while trying to break up a fight between two inmates.
Multiple inmates were involved in a brawl in the cafeteria during mealtime.
A fight broke out in the exercise yard and several inmates sustained injuries.
Two inmates were caught on camera fighting in their cell.
A group of inmates attacked a fellow prisoner in the shower area.
An inmate was severely beaten by a gang in their cell block.
A fight between two inmates in the prison library led to a lockdown of the facility.
A riot broke out in the prison yard and multiple inmates were injured.
An inmate was hospitalized after being assaulted by another prisoner in the mess hall.
Several inmates were involved in a physical altercation in the prison chapel.
A fight between rival gangs in the prison yard resulted in several injuries and property damage.
A prison guard was attacked by multiple inmates during a routine cell search.
An inmate was killed in a fight with another prisoner in their cell.
A gang of inmates staged a violent takeover of a cell block, injuring several prisoners and guards.
